metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3619 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The __socket_proto_state_machine function in GlusterFS 3.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a "00000000" fragment header. It was discovered that GlusterFS incorrectly handled network requests. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: glusterfs package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.2-2ubuntu1').
